page.title: 17LAMPLUGH SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: There are 96 Senior Citizens in Lamplugh parish, 39 men and 57 women. The oldest person is 95 years old. You have to be over 60 to join. When you are over 60 you automatically join. Out of all the Senior Citizens only 9 work. People who want to can go on a trip or to the Christmas party if they like. In 1984 about 50 people went to the Christmas party in the Women's Institute. The Senior Citizens was started by the Reverand Goddard and people gave donations to start their funds. Now they raise their money from Bingos, Stalls and Raffles. The Senior Citizens have been going since 1973. This year there is a committee of 16.
